A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not the worst SW movie ever\, but easily the most damaging to the lore. I didnt have a problem with the risks as far as killing Snoke and Luke\, but Rian Johnson did a character assasination on Luke rendering the Original Trilogy almost meaningless and almost depressing. And for everyone calling Rey a Mary Sue that I argued with...my apologies. You were all 100 percent right.
